Producer: Lynda Obst, Roger Birnbaum, Edward Zwick, Gary Barber
Production Co: Lynda Obst Productions, Paramount Pictures, Bedford Falls Productions, Spyglass Entertainment
Sound Mix: Dolby SR, DTS, Dolby Stereo, Surround, Dolby A, Dolby Digital
Synopsis: A psychological thriller about a senior (Katie Holmes) at one of America's most prestigious universities. Under enormous pressure to complete her thesis and earn a top job at one of the world's most competitive consulting firms, Katie is still coping with the sudden unexplained disappearance of her first love two years prior. As the investigation continues, Katie is forced to choose between past passions and new possibilities, even as new facts are uncovered.
Title: Abandon
